column5: Yes I had my hand up.LOL   Question.......................  Are we going to try and have different forums aswell here? Off topic,hunting,Miscellaneous topics?     Thanks
I doubt it.  but I 2nd that motion.  Even if it's just NF and F.
Hey Raf what up dude?  It would be a nice change,also take up less time in going through the threads.
I didnt realize there was anything but NF threads.  Probably cuz I never catch anything
Good idea, strictly fishing related topics.
As of now...no.  So had had 9:56 AM in the pool anyway?
Let's put up a poll for old time's sakes ;D
LOL Rick.  There is hope though.  It wasn't a resounding, shut yer trap, I don't wanna hear about it "NO".
